gameview.sView

Class SPlayerSettingPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gameview.sView.SPlayerSettingPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SPlayerSettingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Within this panel there are the configurations for each player. In dependency on the player number there are 2-4 SPlayerPanels. This panel only create's and interact's with this panels to check if the values are conform to start a game.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • SPlayerSettingPanel

        public SPlayerSettingPanel(SState sState,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> language)
        The constructor to commit the current language an the SState. Also the Layout will be set.
        Parameters:
        sState - The start state
        language - Map with language data

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
        This method adds a actionListener to the both buttons next and abort.
        Parameters:
        actionListener - action listener

      • checkColors

        public boolean checkColors()
        This method checks the current chosen colors. If no conflicts exist it returns true.
        Returns:
        check, which is true when there are no conflicts exist.

      • checkFigureCount

        public void checkFigureCount()
        The checkFigureCount() compares the figure count of every panel with the maximal figure count and set the current figure count.

      • checkIcons

        public boolean checkIcons()
        This method returns true if the icons are not conflicted.
        Returns:
        check True, if the icons are not conflicted

      • checkNames

        public boolean checkNames()
        This method checks if the NameTextfields are filled with a name. Yes?= true.
        Returns:
        check, which is true when there are no conflicts exist.

      • checkNext

        public void checkNext()
        This method is called on every onRender() and when something is changed by the user. If there is everything configured for the game the StartGameButton set enabled.

      • checkTypes

        public boolean checkTypes()
        A method which checks the police and the thief count. No conflicts = true.
        Returns:
        check, which is true when there are no conflicts exist.

      • getMaxFigureBox

        public javax.swing.JComponent getMaxFigureBox()
        This method commits the empty maxFigureBox.
        Returns:
        maxFigureBox Maximum figure box

      • getMaxFigureCount

        public int getMaxFigureCount()
        This getter is necessary to compare the figurecounts of each player.
        Returns:
        maxFigureCount Maximum of figures

      • getplayerArray

        ISPlayer[] getplayerArray()
        Get array with all players-
        Returns:
        Array with all players

      • init

        public void init()
        The init method which calls every method that "setup" the GUI elements. Also the SPlayerSettingHandler will be added to have an actionListener

      • initMaxFigureBox

        public void initMaxFigureBox()
        This method initializes every element of the maxFigureBox. This method is also called if the current figure count is changed.

      • initPlayerArray

        public void initPlayerArray()
        This method initializes the player array which contains the player settings in an SPlayer object for each player. IMPORTANT STUFF!!!

      • processEvent

        public void processEvent(IAEvent event)
        This method processes the incoming events. LANGUAGE_SWITCHED = language is changed -> go and change that things! PLAYER_COUNT = we got X Players -> go and make me some SPlayerPanels!
        Parameters:
        event - A event

      • setMaxFigureCount

        public void setMaxFigureCount(int maxFigureCount)
        Set maximum of figures.
        Parameters:
        maxFigureCount - Maximum of figures

      • setPlayerPanelBox

        public void setPlayerPanelBox()
        This method create the SPlayerPanels and commit different initialization data. Also the methods getPlayerInfos() and checkFigureCount are called. The getPlayerInfos() method is a test method which print the values of every element that is necessary of every SPlayerPanel. The checkFigureCount() compares the figure count of every panel with the maximal figure count and set the current figure count.

      • setupButtonBox

        public void setupButtonBox()
        Setup of the "button box" panel with the two buttons "next" and "abort". Also the maxFigureBox will be added at the left side.

      • setupContentBox

        public void setupContentBox()
        Setup of the big "content box" panel which holds the "map box" and the "settings box" panel.

      • setupTitle

        public void setupTitle()
        Setup of the title. Nothing else

      • switchLanguage

        public void switchLanguage(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> language)
        This method changes every element title or text to the current language if requested.
        Parameters:
        language - Map with language data
